extendedInfo.description: THIS IS NOT YOUR MOM'S MONOPOLY: Are you ready to do whatever it takes to bank a million bucks first and become a MONOPOLY Millionaire? "GO" for it!**The game is packed with fun graphics and animations. Please note that it requires up to 950MB+ of free space on your device after the initial download. To speed things up, we recommend connecting to WiFi.**FIRST TO A MILLION WINS! Enjoy a fast, fresh take on the classic MONOPOLY game. Do you have the drive to be a MONOPOLY Millionaire? Trade properties on the sly, force powerful land-grabbing deals, and risk it all â in a private jettinâ, yacht clubbinâ dash for a million in cash. Bling out your phone with an exclusive MONOPOLY Millionaire live wallpaper â for FREE!LIVE THE MILLIONAIRE LIFESTYLE AS YOUâ¦â¢ Zoom past wannabes in the fastest MONOPOLY experience ever! â¢ Purchase palatial Dreamland Properties like Bling Beach and Paradise Islandâ¢ Splurge on upgradable Movers â show friends how hot you roll!â¢ Test your moneymaker with 3 difficulty modesâ¢ Get lucky! Fortune Cards can speed up your rise OR send you back to brokeReady to feel like a million? GO for it! Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: FUN
reviews.comment: Very fun Different in a nice way fun for every one.   Electronic arts needs to put a better simcity on here
reviews.author: J Friend

reviews.title: Too short
reviews.comment: Liked the game but was over too quickly.  I was trading with AI and didn\'t realize it put AI over $2000 mark even though  I just acquired another complete set of properties
reviews.author: Brenda Barberich

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app is really great.  It\'s a great bargain. It\'s really fun and good
reviews.author: Tyler Lam

reviews.comment: I like the game but they need to raise the amount you have to get to win the game......... Cause 2 million is just too low...... The game is over way to fast...... Change that and I\'ll make it a 5 star game........
reviews.author: David Phipps

reviews.title: Rigged
reviews.comment: This game is rigged against the computer. This is NOT your classic! Harder to use. The computer has all these cards that make the whole game unfair. I dont suggest it.
reviews.author: Cammi Lynn

reviews.title: LOVING IT!
reviews.comment: My wife and I love it!  I bought her a copy for her tablet as well and we play with each other via Wi-Fi and we\'re having a BLAST!
reviews.author: Sean Andre

reviews.title: Needs a little work
reviews.comment: Two million is too low.  Should be easy to add some options to make it four million, five million, or last man standing.   And it should calculate the total estate value.  I can own three sets of property with hotels and still lose because a computer player has more cash than I do.
reviews.author: Chris Medley

reviews.title: Cute game.
reviews.comment: It\'s a cute game, Game ends too fast. Needs option for higher max amounts. That would make the game alot longer.
reviews.author: Sarah Taylor

reviews.title: Why??
reviews.comment: I really did enjoy the game. It really should have an option to play last one standing. Just got done puting down major hotels when my opponent had non and just when I was on top. He wins because he past go more than me and didn\'t spend anything. Really??
reviews.author: Mike breon

reviews.title: M Meier
reviews.comment: I enjoyed playing Monopoly on my phone, but I think the winner should be judged on \"Net Worth\" rather than just how much money you have. If I have 6 hotels on the board with no one else having monopolies on the board, and I send the first player to bankruptcy, that deserves a win. Rather than the computer who owns 3 properties with 700k in their hand. Other Monopoly games calculate the Net Worth as the ranking of players and so does every version of Monopoly rules. Please follow suit.
reviews.author: Maxwell Meier

reviews.title: Had potential
reviews.comment: Made stupid changes that made it suck. Should have been the winner is the one who knocks everyone out. Not who ever has the most money when one person goes out. And 2000k is way too low. I know I\'m not alone developers make changes!!!
reviews.author: Michael Longe

reviews.comment: It sucks. Basically, it sucks. You cant upgrade houses. Bad enough, isn\'t it? But.not yet. There\'s still more. So don\'t get this. The graphic is a trap
reviews.author: An Vo

reviews.title: Game doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I just downloaded games for my note 2 and Uploaded it just to come to find out that it don\'t work. That\'s a dollar down the drain
reviews.author: Koolaid Roldan

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: Very similar to classic Monopoly and you don\'t need to bankrupt the other person to win.
reviews.author: Michael Kusela

reviews.title: Nice, but original better
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game, played it a couple of times with friend and against computer. But classical monopoly is way better
reviews.author: Nicholas Lovick

reviews.title: Needs More Custom Options
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game but it needs more options to customize play. For example raising the maximum win amount. Currently you can choose either 1 or 2 mil. Also I don\'t like the way when 1 player gets bankrupt the game is over, there should be an option for that, ie. to continue to play which is very useful for 3 or 4 player games. Hope this is addressed.
reviews.author: Roberto Cho

reviews.title: Can\'t even play.
reviews.comment: Freezes loading every time. Reinstalled 2 times. I want my $ back
reviews.author: mariela martinez

reviews.title: Waist of time
reviews.comment: You spend 20 mins building up your property and someone else wins when a single player goes bankrupt. Lame
reviews.author: Derek Graffen

reviews.title: Too shory
reviews.comment: Its a fun game but you can only go to 2million even on hard the game is over wayyyy too fast. If you had option to change to a higher amount or bankrupt it would be a lot better game
reviews.author: Kris Tripp

reviews.title: Excellent variant on the original
reviews.comment: This game helps create a scenario where even with four players you can end a game early.  Build hotels too quickly and you\'ll run out of dough so when dog hits your hotel and busts another person wins not you...strategy critical here.
reviews.author: John Slyfield
